description:
Samuel Knight Energy are thrilled to represent one of the country's leading engineering consultancies, particularly in the realm of environmental specialist consultant engineering.

Business Development / Business Lead: Consultant Engineering (Environment & Civil) to Renewable Energy sector.

Our client boasts an outstanding reputation for delivering expert land development engineering and environmental consulting services to a diverse clientele, ranging from major developers to renewable energy producers and large infrastructure programs.

As they continue to expand their footprint in the renewable energy market, we are excited to collaborate with them in their pursuit of excellence, market leadership and to being the best employer in the country.

This pivotal and expanding position calls for a Renewable Energy subject matter expert capable of not just contributing technically but spearheading the growth of our client's renewable energy practice.

We seek individuals with extensive connections within the industry, particularly with typical client bases such as developers, EPC companies, and other key stakeholders involved in utility-scale solar projects.

The ideal candidate will bring not only a wealth of experience but also a robust network that can be leveraged to build and expand the business within our client's esteemed consultancy.

Subject Matter Expert in Renewable Energy Sector; Utility Scale Solar, Storage and / or Wind markets.

---

Location: Our client has locations across the country. The target markets, where there is most opportunity, for our client are Texas, California, Colorado - Denver, or Florida. Candidates in these states would be particularly interesting, but the right candidate can be anywhere.

Salary: Dependent on Experience; a detailed structure of available compensation is available during the first screening conversation with Samuel Knight Energy's search consultant.

Samuel Knight Energy, the leading recruiter in renewable energy, is seeking a dynamic and experienced individual to join our client, a leading consultant engineering practice, as a Business Development Lead - Environmental Consultant Engineering, Renewable Energy.

This role demands a subject matter expert in the renewable energy sector, who possesses an entrepreneurial existing network of contacts and can target business opportunities effectively. The ideal candidate will have transferable clients and potentially be able to bring a team of consultant engineers with them.

About Our Client:

Our client provides expert land development engineering and environmental consulting services for major developers, renewable energy producers, energy companies, corporations, healthcare systems, colleges/universities, and large infrastructure programs throughout the U.S. and worldwide. With a culture that fosters entrepreneurial spirit, career growth, diversity, equity, and inclusion, our client consistently ranks among the top firms in the industry.

Job Responsibilities:
• Drive business development activities by developing new clients and strengthening relationships with existing ones.
• Lead multi-disciplinary efforts on renewable energy projects, including environmental consulting, civil engineering, development and permitting.
• Manage multiple projects within specific budgets, schedules, and deadlines.
• Write and review draft proposals and reports, including feasibility studies, stormwater management reports, technical specifications, and utility reports.
• Supervise, mentor and grow a team of technical staff working on renewable energy-related assessment, design, and permitting tasks.

Basic Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Environmental Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field (Master’s degree preferred).
• 7+ years of experience in Renewable Energy, and demonstrable experience and suitability to provide consultant engineering within environmental and civil engineering.
• 7+ years of multidisciplinary Project Management experience.
• Knowledge of land use processes and regulations.
• Ability to perform limited travel to project sites.

Skills and Experience Preferred:
• Valid Professional Engineer, Professional Geologist, Professional Wetland Scientist, or AICP license a plus.
• Strong client development, communication, and management abilities.
• Self-starter with the ability to manage, motivate, partner, mentor, and lead others.
• Demonstrated ability to effectively manage projects from concept through construction documents.
• Active participation in professional organizations.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• Strong attention to detail with excellent analytical and judgment capabilities.
• Possessing a valid driver’s license in good standing is preferred.

Your team & colleagues:

The local community of colleagues you would work with, depends largely on your location. Candidates on the east coast will likely report to the senior national management team, while those in Texas, Colorado, or Florida may have a local area leader with interaction from the national team.

Subject Matter Expertise:

We are seeking a true Renewable Energy leader who is a subject matter expert in renewable energy, preferably with experience in utility-scale solar projects. The role encompasses providing technical services while growing the opportunities and revenue of the business, acting as a client facing point of contact.

If you are a dynamic leader with expertise in renewable energy and a drive for business development, we encourage you to apply and be a part of our client's strategic growth in the renewable energy market.
